stories.title: Welcome to Plum!
stories.description:
You will receive your health card within the next 30 days.

Rest assured, your policy covers your wellbeing from day one.

Let's begin your onboarding journey and see what we have in store for you!

stories.title: Take doctor consultations from  your home
stories.description: Get 24x7 access to 20+ specialised doctors a click away on your phone.

stories.title: Keep a constant check on your health
stories.description: Take quick assessments to stay updated on your physical, mental, and nutritional well-being.

stories.title:
Well-being is 
cheaper now!
stories.description: Shop from your favourite wellness brands at exclusive discounts.

stories.title: Ask it, it knows!
stories.description: Don't suffer in silence. Ask away your insurance doubts to PolicyGPT.

stories.title: We meet with you every week!
stories.description: Well-being doesn't have to be boring. Dance along in our weekly wellness sessions.

stories.title: Well-being is cheaper now!
stories.description: Count your dependents in on your healthcare journey from day one with independent login.

stories.title: How much would it cost?
stories.description: Plan things better with a time and expense estimate for any treatment you're planning in the upcoming days.

questions.question: My allergies started acting up. What to do?

answers.hint: You can book your Telehealth appointment anytime under the health section!
